JAVA Web service

Soap web service

When you generate java code with wsdl, the jvm says Failed to read schema document 'xjc.xsd', because 'file' access is not allowed due to restriction set by the accessExternalSchema property.

To correct this problem, do the following command.

Create a file named jaxp.properties (if it doesn't exist) under /path/to/jdk1.8.0/jre/lib and then write this line in it: 

javax.xml.accessExternalSchema = all
